quote: Obamacare is not working. You just described your premium increases, your deductible increases. A third of the counties in Wisconsin are down to one insurer right here. We've got dozens of counties around America that have zero insurers left.
quotePlain: Obamacare is not working. You just described your premium increases, your deductible increases. A third of the counties in Wisconsin are down to one insurer right here. Weâ€™ve got dozens of counties around America that have zero insurers left.
name: Paul Ryan

checks.quote: Ryan said dozens of counties have no insurers left on the Obamacare exchanges. The day he said that, there was only one such county. Less than a week before he said that, there were two counties. His office acknowledged that he misspoke.
checks.quotePlain: Ryan said dozens of counties have no insurers left on the Obamacare exchanges. The day he said that, there was only one such county. Less than a week before he said that, there were two counties. His office acknowledged that he misspoke.

claims.title: dozens of counties will have zero Obamacare insurers in 2018
claims.negative: dozens of counties will not have zero Obamacare insurers in 2018
claims.negativePlain: dozens of counties will not have zero Obamacare insurers in 2018
claims.truth: This is an old talking point, the number steadily decreased until it reached zero on 2017-08-23.
claims.truthPlain: This is an old talking point, the number steadily decreased until it reached zero on 2017-08-23.
